description: Try our easy to follow Safari Sunset recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Juice,Orange,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Safari Sunset Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: For each serve, add 1 tsp pomegranate juice to base of 10 tall glasses. Top with ice.
Carefully pour in 1/4 cup orange juice over the back of a spoon so the juice floats on top of the pomegranate juice. Repeat with pineapple juice and finish with 2 tbs soda water.
